014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields;
016
017import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.setBlankIsValid;
018import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.setOnMissingProperty;
019import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.setOnMissingValue;
020import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.setValues;
021import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition;
022import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
023import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
024
025import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueCache;
026import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider;
027import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider.PropertyBackedValueAdapter;
028import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper;
029import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.StringDefinition;
030import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields.StringField;
031
032import java.util.Properties;
033
034import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
035import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
036
037public class TestStringField {
038
039    @Test
040    public void testSimple() {
041        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
042        setValues(f1, "foo");
043
044        f1.check();
045
046        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
047        assertEquals("foo", sf1.getValue());
048    }
049
050    @Test
051    public void testTwoValues() {
052        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
053        setValues(f1, "foo", "bar", "baz");
054
055        f1.check();
056
057        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
058        assertEquals("foo", sf1.getValue());
059    }
060
061    @Test
062    public void testIgnoreBlank() {
063        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
064        setValues(f1, "", "      ", "baz");
065        setBlankIsValid(f1, false);
066
067        f1.check();
068
069        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
070        assertEquals("baz", sf1.getValue());
071    }
072
073    @Test
074    public void testAcceptBlank() {
075        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
076        setValues(f1, "      ", "baz");
077        setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
078
079        f1.check();
080
081        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
082        assertEquals("      ", sf1.getValue());
083    }
084
085    @Test
086    public void testAcceptEmpty() {
087        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
088        setValues(f1, "", "baz");
089        setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
090
091        f1.check();
092
093        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
094        assertEquals("", sf1.getValue());
095    }
096
097    @Test
098    public void testNullValueIsEmptyString() {
099        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
100        setValues(f1, null, "wibble");
101        setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
102
103        f1.check();
104
105        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
106        assertEquals("", sf1.getValue());
107    }
108
109    @Test
110    public void testSimpleProperty() {
111        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
112
113        f1.check();
114
115        final Properties props = new Properties();
116        props.setProperty("hello", "foo");
117        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
118        assertEquals("foo", sf1.getValue());
119    }
120
121    @Test
122    public void testSimplePropertyWithDefault() {
123        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
124        setValues(f1, "baz");
125
126        f1.check();
127
128        final Properties props = new Properties();
129        props.setProperty("hello", "foo");
130        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
131        assertEquals("foo", sf1.getValue());
132    }
133
134    @Test
135    public void testNoProperty() {
136        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
137        setValues(f1, "baz");
138
139        f1.check();
140
141        final Properties props = new Properties();
142        props.setProperty("hello2", "foo");
143        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
144        assertEquals("baz", sf1.getValue());
145    }
146
147    @Test
148    public void testIgnoreBlankProperty() {
149        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
150        setBlankIsValid(f1, false);
151        setValues(f1, "baz");
152
153        f1.check();
154
155        final Properties props = new Properties();
156        props.setProperty("hello", "");
157        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
158        assertEquals("baz", sf1.getValue());
159    }
160
161    @Test
162    public void testNothing() {
163
164        assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () -> {
165            final StringDefinition f1 = stringDefinition("hello");
166            setOnMissingValue(f1, "fail");
167            setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
168            f1.check();
169
170            final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
171            assertEquals("baz", sf1.getValue());
172        });
173    }
174
175    @Test
176    public void testNothingIgnore() {
177        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
178        setOnMissingValue(f1, "ignore");
179        setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
180
181        f1.check();
182
183        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
184        assertEquals("", sf1.getValue());
185    }
186
187    @Test
188    public void testMissingProperty() {
189        ValueCache valueCache = new ValueCache();
190
191        assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () -> {
192            final StringDefinition f1 = stringDefinition("hello");
193            setOnMissingValue(f1, "ignore");
194            setOnMissingProperty(f1, "fail");
195            setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
196
197            f1.check();
198
199            final ValueProvider provider = valueCache.findCurrentValueProvider(ImmutableMap.<String, String>of(), f1);
200
201            final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, provider);
202            assertEquals("", sf1.getValue());
203        });
204    }
205
206    @Test
207    public void testBlankPropertyValue() {
208        ValueCache valueCache = new ValueCache();
209
210        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
211        setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
212
213        f1.check();
214
215        final ImmutableMap<String, String> props = ImmutableMap.of("hello", "");
216        final ValueProvider provider = valueCache.findCurrentValueProvider(props, f1);
217
218        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, provider);
219        assertEquals("", sf1.getValue());
220    }
221
222    @Test
223    public void testBlankValue() {
224        final StringDefinition f1 = DefinitionHelper.stringDefinition("hello");
225        setValues(f1, "", "foo");
226        setBlankIsValid(f1, true);
227
228        f1.check();
229
230        final StringField sf1 = StringField.forTesting(f1, ValueProvider.NULL_PROVIDER);
231        assertEquals("", sf1.getValue());
232    }
233}
